title: Knife, early 20th century
markings: On blade: a W with a line though the middle, symbolizing a W and an A for Auclair & Wilson. On reverse: "(indistinct) DEPOSE/ J.C.F./INOXYABLE"
provenance: Collection part of inventory of the firm Auclair and Wilson in Paris, which closed around 1950.
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. John M. Thompson in memory of Mr. and Mrs. G. Auclair
description: Rounded, straight blade. Fluted handle narrows towards pointed end.

tombstone.epitaph:
Knife, early 20th century.
early 20th century. ivory, steel. Gift of Mr. and Mrs. John M. Thompson in memory of Mr. and Mrs. G. Auclair. 1990-67-13.
